indicator_name: 경제환경 측면에서 지속가능관광 모니터링을 위한 표준 회계 툴 이행
target_name: 일자리 창출 및 지역 문화 및 상품을 홍보하는 관광업의 지속가능발전 영향을 모니터링 하는 도구 개발 및 이행

en.title: Number of sustainable tourism strategies or policies and implemented action plans with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
en.graph_title: Number of sustainable tourism strategies or policies and implemented action plans with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
en.indicator_name: Implementation of standard accounting tools to monitor the economic and environmental aspects of tourism sustainability
en.target: Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 782kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
